snippet: General Motors is selling its unprofitable European car business to the French maker of Peugeot, marking the American company's retreat from a major market and raising concerns of job cuts in the region....

headline.main: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio
headline.print_headline: Warriors Will Navigate a 'Bizarre' Schedule to San Antonio

lead_paragraph: General Motors is selling its unprofitable European car business to the French maker of Peugeot, marking the American company's retreat from a major market and raising concerns of job cuts in the region.
